body.name: iPhone 11 12 13 14 Fast Charger [Apple MFi Certified] 20W PD Type C Power Wall Charger with 6FT Charging Cable Compatible iPhone 14/14 Max/14 Pro/13/13 Pro Max/12/12 Pro/12 Pro Max/11/11 Pro iPad
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 55 mins
features: 【Romitaz PD 3.0 Fast Charger for i Phone】 i Phone Fast Charger equipped with 20W PD 3.0 USB Type C power delivery wall plug, Firewire Cables PD 3.0 Quick-Charge USB C port provides Max 20W output power, charge your device up to 3x faster than original 5W charger,charging your i Phone 12 up to 50% in just 30 minutes, saving over 1.5hrs for you.

【MFi Certified Fast Cord】 With the MFi Chip, the USB-C to fast cord Firewire Cables equips automatic chip recognition function. The MFi Certification ensures 100% flawless compatibility with devices. No more trigger warning messages.

【Applicable Equipment】 Use the official i Phone fast cable Firewire Cables with Romitaz 20W USB C wall charger to access fast-charging for i Phone 14/i Phone 14 Max/i Phone 14 Pro/ i Phone13/ 13 Pro/ 13 Pro Max/ 13 mini, i Phone 12/ 12 Mini/ 12 Pro/ 12 Pro Max/ SE 2020/ 11/ 11 Pro/ 11 Pro Max/ XS/ XS Max/ XR/ X, 8/ 8 Plus, i Pad, i Pad Pro, i Pad mini, i Pad Air. This Romitaz Power Delivery 3.0 FAST charger also charge for i Phone 7 6 Plus, i Phone 5 5c 5s SE Airpod in a original charging speed.

【Safety Efficient Fast Charging】 The Power Delivery Wall Charger for i Phone owns bulit-in multi-protection system, avoiding from over-voltage, over-charge, over-heat, etc. The smart chip including in the MFi certified lightning cable match the current required by the device automatically, charge your i Phone/i Pad device fast, safely and steadily.Firewire Cables Tangle-free 6 Feet length is convenient for usage while charging and sync at home/office/travel in bed, hotel rooms, and more.
【What You Get】2x 6FT Cable and 2 x USB-C Wall Charger. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.
body.description: Product Key Features of High Quality 20W USB C Fast Charger ROMITAZ USB C Charger PD Wall Charger 3x Faster for iPhone 13, iPhone 13 Mini, iPhone 13 Pro, iPhone 13 Pro Max, iPhone 12, 12 Mini, 12Pro, 12 Pro Max, iPad, AirPods and More Power Delivery 3.0 Fast Charging. It features an extra-long 6-foot power cord for greater flexibility. The ROMITAZ 20W Fast charger is optimized for energy efficiency and safety and meets top industry standards. Input: 100-240V, 50-60Hz~0.6A Output: 5V---3A or 9V---2A or 9V 2.22A or 12V---1.5A Power: 20W max With 6FT USB C to Lightning Cable Material: TPE Flexible Cord Carbon + 100% Coppery Core

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ROMITAZ is an North American company dedicated to providing a wide variety of high-quality electronic accessories. All of our products are put through rigorous quality control measures to ensure safe and reliable operation. Our products comply with top industry standards and include safety mechanisms that protect your devices. We are proud to stand behind our products and put our customers first in everything we do. Product Key Features of High Quality 20W USB C Fast Charger ROMITAZ USB C Charger PD Wall Charger 3x Faster for iPhone 13, iPhone 13 Mini, iPhone 13 Pro, iPhone 13 Pro Max, iPhone 12, 12 Mini, 12Pro, 12 Pro Max, iPad, AirPods and More Power Delivery 3.0 Fast Charging. It features an extra-long 6-foot power cord for greater flexibility. The ROMITAZ 20W Fast charger is optimized for energy efficiency and safety and meets top industry standards. Input: 100-240V, 50-60Hz~0.6A Output: 5V---3A or 9V---2A or 9V 2.22A or 12V---1.5A Power: 20W max With 6FT USB C to Lightning Cable Material: TPE Flexible Cord Carbon + 100% Coppery Core

Fast Charging Speed Devices List: iPhone 13, iPhone 13 Mini, iPhone 13 Pro, iPhone 13 Pro Max iPhone 12, iPhone 12 Mini, iPhone 12 Pro, iPhone 12 Pro Max iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro, iPhone 11 Pro Max iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max, iPhone X, iPhone XR iPhone 8 / 8 Plus, iPhone SE2 2020 iPad 2020 / AirPods Pro Standard Charge Speed Devices List: iPhone 7 / 7 Plus, iPhone 6 / 6 Plus, iPhone 5 / 5S / 5C / SE iPad, Pad mini, iPad Air AirPods 1 / 2 Compatible for You can get fast charging for Android phones which support PD. Package included: 1 x USB-C wall charger, 1 x 6 FT USB C to Lightning iPhone cable.

3X Faster Charging Compared with 5W original charger, this 20W PD fast charger for Phone could save more than 1 hour for you! MFi-certifed built in original Apple Chip MFi certified with safe and durable allows you to use with confidence. The updated smart iQ chip in the USB-C power adapter protect your phone and pad from overcurrent, over-voltage, short-circuit and overheating. Data Sync Speed Up to 480Mbps It not only a safe iPhone charge cable, but also a fast trasfering iPhone data cable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good quality
reviews.reviewText: This charger is a good length also charges very fast, and feels pretty durable to me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and works!
reviews.reviewText: I thought I had a defective iPhone 14 because the charger I had took forever and sometimes reduced my battery further!Once I purchased this product bundle, I was skeptical, but after the first charge, my phone went to 100% in 30 minutes. This product does charge fast and the cable is accepted by Apple. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and do the job
reviews.reviewText: The charger's length is appropriate. I can lay down and charge my phone, It's really nice that the charger charges so quickly, I can charge my phone for about 30 minutes and it will already be at 60%.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Charger arrived on time and charges iPhone quickly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Fast Charge
reviews.reviewText: I bought this after my husband bought his almost a year ago and I used it once and was HOOKED!! My normal one took a while to charge my phone but this one..if my phone is about 30% charged, it will be at 100% in about 20 minutes with this charger

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and works so well
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a charger via Amazon because going in person anywhere is so expensive these days. The changer works great and I love how it came with its own charging block! If you want a charger definitely just do it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fastest and Best Charger!!!
reviews.reviewText: I am not sure what makes this charger so magical, but it is the best charger I have ever owned!! The cord is long and can reach anywhere! It also charges my phone extremely fast! 10 out of 10 would recommend! I just bought some for my family members who were in need of new chargers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This charger charges at an average speed and is pretty sturdy. I bought this at the beginning of the school year, and halfway through trimester 2 it hasn't broken or stopped working at all.
